thread.title: His & her spa package at So Spa with L’Occitane
thread.title_full: His & her spa package at So Spa with L’Occitane

author: Phuketindex
title: His & her spa package at So Spa with L’Occitane
text:
Home » Features , Travel & Food » His & her spa package at So Spa with L’Occitane His & her spa package at So Spa with L’Occitane Written by Phuketindex | October 12, 2015 | 0 | 
October 2015, Krabi – Throughout November, Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort invites couples to enjoy a special “His & Her Package” at So SPA with L’Occitane. The blissful treatment includes a 30-minute Aromatic Thai Steam Bath, followed by a 60-minute Shea Body Treatment with L’Occitane’s products, and finishes with a 60-minute relaxing Aromachologie Massage for her, and 60-minute Deep Tissue Intense Relief Massage for him, all for just THB 6,500 nett per couple . 
For more information and reservation, please call +66 (0) 75 627 800 or write us an email to H6184-TH@SOFITEL.COM
